item.title: Water is bubbling out of the ground, 12th October
item.description:
After the road narrows and by the style gate. Water is bubbling out of the tarmac. It did this last year resulting in black ice. It started again after the recent heavy rain and hasnâ€™t yet stopped bubbling up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Culvert blocked and risk of flooding, 11th October
item.description:
I reported this issue waited 48hrs and heard nothing so took my digger down and drain rods and cleared the culvert and ditch. I then recieved an email saying not blocked - no further action required was just abnormal rain level!! Who assessed this? Could they not see the obvious work that had been done, I'm not stupid, I know the difference between a blocked pipe and just excess rain fall. The outstanding issue is that the pipe under the road is at significant risk of re blocking, and subsequently the pipe that then carries the water away could block and cause flooding to the local property. The culvert needs a grill or some form of protection, and the ditch leading to the drain needs significant maintenance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lowdilow Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Moon crater of a pothole., 11th October
item.description:
This is a massive pothole. I hit it this morning and it shook my car to s****. I will need to get the wheels, tyres and suspension checked now. It was one hell of a jolt at 25mph in the morning rush hour. Needs fixing asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kew Place, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Priority Sign wording has been reversed, 11th October
item.description:
Approaching chicane from Gotherington to Bishop Cleeve down near new sports facility (i e. Southbound on Cleeve Lane the priority sign wording has been reversed. It should have " give way to oncoming vehicles" instead reads reverse wording " priority over oncoming vehicles" A dangerous mistake with traffic pulling out on to the opposite carriageway giving rise to near misses with northbound traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gotherington Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
